sentence.Network_en: Reflection had given calmness to her judgment and sobered her own opinon of Willougbby's deserts.
sentence.Network_cn: 思考已经使她的见解冷静下来了,也使她自己对威洛比的功过有了清醒的看法.

list.abs: I agree in principle , but i've some other opinons原则上同意，但我还有些其他看法
I agree in principle , but i've some other opinons原则上我同意，不过我有些其它的看法
Everyone may express his own opinon ., 人人都可以发表自己的观点.

auth_sentence.content: They simply overlooked the risk of one, in my opinon.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: They simply overlooked the risk of one, in my opinon.

auth_sentence.content: Ps- no mater what i wrote you should have your own opinon.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ps- no mater what i wrote you should have your own opinon.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ps- no mater what i wrote you should have your own opinon.

auth_sentence.content: But this little forum is not a contest; it's just discussion and opinon.
auth_sentence.res_content: But this little forum is not a contest; it's just discussion and opinon.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But this little forum is not a contest; it's just discussion and opinon.
